titles.title: Securing Our Airspace from Reconnaissance Act of 2023
Securing Our Airspace from Reconnaissance Act of 2023
To prohibit the use of Federal funds for unmanned aircraft systems from foreign entities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
